data.title: Korn and Six Other Bands Join ShipRocked Cruise 2012, Brutality at Sea Awaits
data.meta_description: ShipRocked 2012, the world's heaviest heavy music cruise, just got even heavier. 'Cause Korn and six other brutally rocking bands have been added to the already massive lineup. data.text:
We have a favor to ask

We're in the midst of our summer membership campaign, and we have until August 25 to raise $7,000. Your contributions are an investment in our election coverage â€“ they help sustain our newsroom, help us plan, and could lead to an increase in freelance writers or photographers. If you value our work, please make a contribution today to help us reach our goal.

Contribute Now

Progress to goal

$7,000

$1,500

ShipRocked 2012, the world's heaviest heavy music cruise, just got even heavier. 'Cause Korn and six other brutally rocking bands have been added to the already massive lineup.

"I did a cruise last year DJing as J Devil," Korn's Jonathan Davis says, "and it was a fucking blast -- such a great time."

Here's the list of new bands added to Shiprocked 2012 and the full lineup.

Pop Evil Hair + grunge + life in Michigan + shred.

Helmet Your dad's favorite metal band, if your dad likes Beavis and Butthead.

The Halo Method A band featuring Ben Moody, ex-Evanescence/We Are The Fallen; Dave Buckner, ex-Papa Roach; and Lukas Rossi, winner of Rockstar Supernova ... More makeup than your mom, but way tougher.

Dead Sara Heavy L.A. rock 'n' roll rocker chicks rocking out.

Write This Down Tooth & Nail Christian core. Don't mess with Jeebus.

Andy Wood & The Amalgam Bluegrass-burning mando expert and Guitarmageddon winner.

ShipRocked 2012 Lineup

-Godsmack

-Korn

-Five Finger Death Punch

-P.O.D.

Sevendust

-Filter

-Fuel

-Black Stone Cherry

-Pop Evil

-Lit

-Helmet

-In This Moment

-Geoff Tate

-The Halo Method

-Gilby Clarke

-Dead Sara

-Write This Down

-Andy Wood & The Amalgam

ShipRocked 2012 with Godsmack, Five Finger Death Punch, P.O.D., Sevendust, and others. Tuesday, November 27, to Saturday, December 1. The MSC Poesia boarding at Port Everglades, 1850 Eller Dr., Fort Lauderdale. Visit getshiprocked.com.

Follow Crossfade on Facebook and Twitter @Crossfade_SFL.
